sentences.en: A supplementary volume has been published containing the index.
sentences.cn: 附有索引的增补卷已经出版.

sentences.en: He says they also will need supplementary food and firewood.
sentences.cn: 他说,他们还将需要得到食品和柴禾的补给.

sentences.en: In this plant oil is supplementary to coal as fuel.
sentences.cn: 在这个工厂,原油是煤的补充燃料.

sentences.en: Methods: Use multimedia software as a supplementary means in experimentation teaching.
sentences.cn: 方法: 在生物药剂学实验教学中采用多媒体课件辅助教学,并观察其效果.

sentences.en: Retail sales can only be your supplementary business.
She satisfies the work of supplementary property.
sentences.cn: 她满足于辅助性的工作.

sentences.en: Supplementary budget just to avoid more serious economic deterioration.
sentences.cn: 追加预算只是避免经济恶化得更严重.

sentences.en: Supplementary oxygen is rarely needed in pressurized aircraft.
sentences.cn: 密封的飞机内很少需要补充氧气。

sentences.en: The Mann - Elkins Act of 1910 had become legislation comprehensive in character, not merely supplementary.
sentences.cn: 1910年的曼 - 埃尔金斯法成为一项综合立法, 不仅仅是补充而已.

sentences.en: The new students received supplementary instruction.
The supplementary reports on specific subjects may be compiled additionally if necessary.
sentences.cn: 并得视实际需要,增编专题研究报告.

sentences.en: There is a supplementary water supply in case the main supply fails.
sentences.cn: 万一主水源断了，我们另外有供水的地方。

sentences.en: There is a supplementary water supply in case the rain supply fails.
sentences.cn: 万一主水源断了,我们另外有供水的地方.

sentences.en: Through similar and supplementary action, polygenes can have important effects on total variability.
sentences.cn: 通过相同的和添加的作用, 多基因可以对总的变异起重大的影响.

sentences.en: Your company should make a supplementary payment for stamp tax.

phrases.tran_cn: 补充规定；追加拨款，增补拨款；追加备付款项

trans.tran_en: provided in addition to what already exists
